If your interested in having a UDF v2.50 image to burn,then simply unpack create-bd9.zip to the same folder as our release .mkv than run create-bd9.exe and choose i and hit the enter key, this will create an .iso within the same directory as input .mkv this process will require approx 23GB of temporary work space, if you would prefer to directly burn to DVD R DL media than you should choose.b when prompted for your initial decision instead than you only need around 15GB
